title: How to welcome a kindergarten student - Quora

response.answer_text: You will be really amazed to know that I have started my career as a kindergarten teacher only. Initially, I was very lost on the fact of how to be with the kindergarteners but slowly and gradually, I have learnt to be with them not as a teacher but as a friend. I used to sing songs and never forgot to wave a hi -five to them. After sometime, That’s how my class looked like this.
